name: DailyMassReadings-FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Can’t make it to Holy Mass? This Flash Briefing offers the daily readings. It is also the perfect way to find time in your day for spiritual reflection.
This flash briefing contains:
- The first reading
- The responsorial psalm
- The second reading on Sundays and feast days,
- The Gospel
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
